column2: "Na
column4: nda na ber no mu a medze Juda na Jerusalɛm ndɔmmum bɛsan aba bio no
column7: na medze hɔn aba Jehosafat bɔnsa no mu; na menye hɔn edzi asɛm wɔ me man na m'egyapadze Israel ntsi

column2: "Na wɔatwe me man ho tonto: na wɔdze abanyimbasiaba apɛ edwaman
column3: na wɔatɔn akataasia agye nsa anom."

column2: "Hom reyɛ me dɛn
column5: na Filistia amantɔw nyina? Ana hom bɛyɛ biribi ahyɛ me ananmu? Na sɛ hom yɛ biribi hyɛ me ananmu a
column6: ɔhardo ntsɛmara na mebɛdan hom ahyɛnanmu no egu hom etsifi."

column2: "Osiandɛ hom afa mo dwetɛ na me sika
column3: na hom dze m'afɛɛfɛdze papa no nyina kɔ hom asɔrdan no mu;"

column2: "hom atɔn Judamba so na Jerusalɛm mba ama Griikfo mba
column3: ama hom eeyi hɔn efi hɔn he do akɔ ekyirekyir:"

column2: "hwɛ
column3: mibekenyan hɔn efi mbrɛ hom tontɔɔn hɔn kɔree no
column4: na madan hom ahyɛnanmu no ebua homankasa hom etsifi;"

column2: "na mobɔtɔn hom mbabanyin na hom mbabaa ahyɛ Judamba nsa
column3: na wɔbɔtɔn hɔn ama Seba mba
column4: ɔman a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir; EWURADZE na ɔaka."

column2: "Hom mbɔ yi dawur wɔ amanaman mu; hom nkyer ɔsa: hom nkenyan mbarimba akatakyi no; hom mma akofo nyina ntwe mbɛn
"Hom mfa hom nsɔw mbobɔ mfona
column3: na hom mfa hom ndar mbobɔ mpeaa: onyia ɔyɛ mberɛw nka dɛ

column2: "Hom nyɛ ntsɛm mbra
column3: hom amanaman a woetwa ehyia nyina
column4: na hom mboa hom ano mbehyia. Ao EWURADZE
column5: hɔ na ma w'akatakyi no wonsian mbra."

column2: "Amanaman nkenyan hɔnho
column3: na wontu mbra Jehosafat bɔnsa no mu: na hɔ na mebɛtsena ase mebu amanaman a woetwa ehyia nyinara atsɛn."

column2: "Hom mfa kantankrankye no nto mu
column3: na ekuadze no aber: hom mbra
column4: hom mbetsiatsia; na nsatwer no ayɛ ma
column5: nkorbaa no ebubu do; na hɔn emumuyɛ adɔɔ so."

column2: "Nyimpa mpempem mu mpempem wɔ atsɛmbu bɔnsa no mu. Na EWURADZE ne da no abɛn wɔ atsɛmbu bɔnsa no mu."
"Ewia na bosoom ahyɛ sum; na nworaba egyaa hyerɛn."
"Na EWURADZE befi Zion apɔw
column3: na oefi Jerusalɛm ama ne ndze do; na ɔsorsor na asaase awosow: na EWURADZE bɛyɛ guansumabea ama ne man

column2: "Ɔno na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a metse Zion
column3: me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do no: nna Jerusalɛm bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔnbea
column4: na ananaben biara runntwa mu wɔ hɔ bio."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ mbepɔw bɔsosɔw nsa fenemfenem
column3: na akoko no do apem numfonsu
column4: na nsu ebu Juda nworaba nyina do; na nsunyiwa befi EWURADZE fie apem akɔfɔw Sittim bɔnsa no."

column2: "Egypt bɛyɛ amamfo
column4: wɔ etsirmɔdzendze a wɔdze yɛɛ Judamba ntsi
column5: na dɛ wɔaka bɔgya a odzi bem egu wɔ hɔn asaase do ntsi."

column2: "Na Juda dze
column4: na Jerusalɛm fi mbasantsen ekesi mbasantsen."

column2: "Na mobɔtɔ hɔn bɔgyaa do wer a monntɔe no : na EWURADZE bɛtsena Zion."
column3: "#3.21 WER A MONNTƆE: Hebriw no kyerɛ awertɔ
column4: mbom Nwoma no bi yɛ no ntsea."
